entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
